document.masterDocTitle: Nebria (Patrobonebria) paropamisos, a new species from the Hindu Kush (Coleoptera, Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
N. himalayica
:
Lectotype
♂ , Goorais Valley ,
May 1887
, J. H. Leech [printed label] //
himalayica Bates
[handwritten label] // Ex Musaeo H. W. Bates 1892 [printed label] // Museum Paris , ex. Coll. R. Oberthur [printed label] //
Lectotype
[red printed label] ( MNHN )
.

Type material of
N. macrocephala
and
N. pallidipes
:

2 ♂ , 1 ♀ Type [red printed label] // Po-o, S. W . Thibet [printed label] //
Nebria macrocephala
n. sp. Breit [in Breit’s handwriting] // ex. Orig. Samlg. J. Breit Wien [printed label] ( NHMB )
;

1 ♂ , same data // Type [red label] // ex. Coll. Breit [handwritten] //
Nebria macrocephala
n. sp. Breit [in Breit’s handwriting] // H. E. Andrewes Coll. , B. M. 1945-97 ( BMNH )
;

paragraph.materialsCitation:
1 ♂ , same data, with additional label:
pallidipes
a.
macrocephala Brt.
( NHMB ); [Remark: Breit (1914) did not correctly recognize the sex, when he described his type specimen series of five females. Four of these five type specimens are available in the Breit collection (in the Frey collection in the NHMB). Andrewes (1929) made the note "I have in my collection a cotype of
macrocephala Breit
".];

1 ♂ Poo , West-Himal ., coll. Splichal // Bashar gegen Shipki Pass nicht Tibet aber a. d. Grenze, Andrewes vid.
6. 9. 1926
[handwritten by Bänninger] //
Nebria macrocephala Breit, Co-Type
6. 1922 [handwritten by Bänninger] (ETHZ). [Remark: This is probably not a specimen of Breit’s type series. Andrewes (1929) cited the locality "Punjab: Bashahr State, Poo" referring possibly to this specimen of the Bänninger collection.]
